about_the_game:
Design interiors, buildings, virtual spaces and more with Arkio on Steam. Try new design ideas and collaborate with others using VR, desktop and mobile to make better design decisions faster. Arkio features a unique volumetric modeling kernel built from the ground-up for modeling in VR, making the modeling experience feel closer to physical model-making than traditional mesh modeling.

In Arkio you can either start from scratch or import your own 3D models and 2D images, then sketch on top of them and export your work back with a bi-directional connection to Rhino, SketchUp Unity and Revit.

  • Collaborate and design with up to 24 people in the same scene
  • 8 Powerful and easy-to-use volumetric modeling tools
  • Work on existing 3D maps or import your own models (OBJ, glTF)
  • Bi-directional plugins to Revit, Rhino, Sketchup Unity and BIM 360
  • Export your designs back to Unity as Game Objects and Revit as native families
  • Work from any scale - use your hands in god scale or move things at human scale - like having design superpowers
  • Create design options on the fly, make changes and see both the original and the new version presented side-by-side
  • Smart components that can be grabbed, stretched, and glued like physical building blocks
  • Collaborate locally in hybrid mode with one VR users and one user on PC
  • Work with program data, sun studies, sections and more!

Visit our website to download our installer that comes with the Rhino/Revit/Sketchup plugins and learn more about the other versions of Arkio.

Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 970 GPU or higher
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
